It has a membership of 55,000 individual lawyers and 190 bar associations and law societies spanning all continents. It has considerable expertise in providing assistance to the global legal community." /><meta id="ctl00_MetaKeywords" name="Keywords" content="International, Bar, Association, law, law firm, lawyer, legal, practitioners,  reform, membership, societies, expertise, resources, committees, constituents, practice, division, professional, public, personal, conferences, commission, human, rights, publications, global, leading, world, institute, money laundering, press, president, regional, fora, anti trust, mediation, arbitration, trade, policy, immigration, intellectual, employment, industrial, relations, insolvency, litigation, Europe, corporate, Africa, Asia, Pacific, banking, business, Arab, maritime, Latin, Vienna conference, annual conference, vienna law conference, vienna meeting" /><meta id="ctl00_Author" name="Author" content="IBA" /><meta id="ctl00_Copyright" name="Copyright" content="Copyright (c) IBA 1999 - Present" /><title>

			<div class="main-slide">
				<div class="container">
					<div class="title-bar flat-title slide-title">
						<h3>
							Latest news updates</h3>
					</div>
					<div class="row flex-row">
						<div class="col-sm-12 col-md-4 col-lg-4">
							<div class="thumbnail homepage ">
								<img alt="North Korea" class="img-responsive hidden-xs" src="/ImageHandler.ashx?ImageUid=a7232606-6cd7-4fe9-a9af-e20c54b563cb" />
								<div class="caption">
									<h3>
										North Korea Inquiry</h3>
									<p>
										On 14 March, the IBA&#39;s War Crimes Committee held a side event at the 37th Session of the UN Human Rights Council, on the role of NGOs in promoting accountability for crimes against humanity, with focus on North Korea. This followed the Committee&#39;s recent report calling for formal investigation into crimes against humanity committed in North Korea&rsquo;s political prisons.</p>
									<div class="btn-group">
										<a class="btn btn-md btn-primary" href="/IBA-War-Crimes-Committee---Inquiry-on-Crimes-Against-Humanity-in.aspx" type="button">Read more</a></div>
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class="col-sm-12 col-md-4 col-lg-4">
							<div class="thumbnail homepage ">
								<img alt="ICC" class="img-responsive hidden-xs" src="/ImageHandler.ashx?ImageUid=5409d744-a014-4472-9e05-d6a9df506a71" />
								<div class="caption">
									<h3>
										ICC agreement on release of persons after acquittal</h3>
									<p>
										The IBA&#39;s International Criminal Court and International Criminal Law (ICC &amp; ICL) Programme has welcomed the signing of agreements between Argentina and the ICC as means to facilitate the Court&rsquo;s ability to realise the rights of the accused under the Rome Statute.</p>
									<div class="btn-group">
										<a class="btn btn-md btn-primary" href="/Article/NewDetail.aspx?ArticleUid=B01F4797-B032-4CE3-A2C4-151176418FBD" type="button">Read more</a></div>
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class="col-sm-12 col-md-4 col-lg-4">
							<div class="thumbnail homepage ">
								<img alt="ICC judges" class="img-responsive hidden-xs" src="/ImageHandler.ashx?ImageUid=c10ef648-fa73-413e-b124-beb4fba5f2fd" />
								<div class="caption">
									<h3>
										Legal innovation</h3>
									<p>
										In a joint IBA-Raconteur supplement, produced for&nbsp;<em>The Times</em> newspaper, which focuses on innovation in the legal sector, including artificial intelligence, blockchain, cybersecurity and the environment, IBA President <strong>Martin &Scaron;olc</strong> has contributed a column on <a href="https://www.raconteur.net/business/quite-obvious-law-firms-will-change-business-model-innovate-products" target="_blank">the future of legal services</a>.</p>
									<div class="btn-group">
										<a class="btn btn-md btn-primary" href="https://www.raconteur.net/legal-innovation-2018" target="_blank" type="button">Read more</a></div>
								</div>
							</div>

									The IBA&rsquo;s <strong>films and podcasts</strong> cover a wide range of legal, business and human rights issues and include interviews, webcasts and documentaries featuring prominent experts.</p>

	<div class="container">

			<h2>
				IBA Initiatives</h2>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="container">
		<div class="row flex-row">
			<div class="col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-xl-3 initiative-item">
				<div class="thumbnail homepage initiative">
					<img alt="" class="img-responsive" src="/ImageHandler.ashx?ImageUid=9d39cb5a-7c47-4afc-952c-770885947d68" />
					<div class="caption initiative-info">
						<h3>
							<a href="/Task-Force-on-the-Future-of-Legal-Services.aspx">Task Force on the Future of Legal Services</a></h3>
						<p class="project-description hidden-xs">
							This Task Force was formed to examine changes affecting the legal profession and ultimately to take steps to assist lawyers in managing those changes. The Task Force released its &#39;Drivers of Change&#39; report in November 2017.</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-xl-3 initiative-item">
				<div class="thumbnail homepage initiative">
					<img alt="IBa and UN logos" class="img-responsive" src="/ImageHandler.ashx?ImageUid=fe6a2d4b-f266-40c0-9bdf-2e2145133438" />
					<div class="caption initiative-info">
						<h3>
							<a href="/Human_Rights_Institute/Campaign-Support-Victims-Torture.aspx">Anti-torture</a></h3>
						<p class="project-description hidden-xs">
							The IBA and the UNOHCHR have partnered to reaffirm the absolute prohibition of torture. The collaboration aims to help prevent it, and to end the impunity that keeps it alive.</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-xl-3 initiative-item">
				<div class="thumbnail homepage initiative">
					<img alt="" class="img-responsive" src="/ImageHandler.ashx?ImageUid=5472ff17-7078-46df-a0df-ac5f1d11bfaf" />
					<div class="caption initiative-info">
						<h3>
							<a href="/Article/NewDetail.aspx?ArticleUid=012A3473-007F-4519-827C-7DA56D7E3509">AI and robotics</a></h3>
						<p class="project-description hidden-xs">
							IBA Global Employment Institute provides in-depth research to multinationals and governments on the likely impact of artificial intelligence and increased automation on the workplace</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-xl-3 initiative-item">
				<div class="thumbnail homepage initiative">

					<div class="caption initiative-info">
						<h3>
							<a>Content highlights</a></h3>
						<p class="hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl">
							:<a href="/corporate-law-highlights.aspx">corporate law</a>, <a href="/financial-services-highlights.aspx">financial services</a>, <a href="/dispute-resolution-highlights.aspx">dispute resolution</a>, <a href="/ICC_ICL_Programme/International-Criminal-Court-highlights.aspx">International Criminal Court&#39;s</a></p>
						<p class="project-description hidden-xs">
							Keep up to date with the latest IBA articles, films, podcasts and reports in the areas of <a href="/corporate-law-highlights.aspx">corporate law</a>, <a href="/financial-services-highlights.aspx">financial services</a>, and <a href="/dispute-resolution-highlights.aspx">dispute resolution</a>. Also, view a broad range of IBA content on the <a href="/ICC_ICL_Programme/International-Criminal-Court-highlights.aspx">International Criminal Court</a>.</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-xl-3 initiative-item">
				<div class="thumbnail homepage initiative">
					<img alt="" class="img-responsive" src="/ImageHandler.ashx?ImageUid=380285ef-6417-40dc-8118-3042eda58b98" />
					<div class="caption initiative-info">
						<h3>
							<a href="/Article/Detail.aspx?ArticleUid=C6079156-3752-4084-A473-A3E1300FD537">IBA Judicial Integrity Initiative</a></h3>
						<p class="project-description hidden-xs">
							This project, undertaken by the IBA Legal Policy and Research Unit, aims to raise awareness of the legal consequences of judicial corruption and combat it through promoting the highest standards of integrity</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-xl-3 initiative-item">

						<h3>
							<a href="/Access/SignIn.aspx?url=/MySite/">My IBA and IBA app</a></h3>
						<p class="project-description hidden-xs">
							My IBA enables you as an IBA member to update your IBA profile and personal details, search the directory and see the latest content from the IBA. Available to&nbsp;members on desktop and via iOS and Android devices&nbsp;</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-4 col-xl-3 initiative-item">

						<h3>
							<a href="/Award-winners-2017.aspx">IBA Awards</a></h3>
						<p class="project-description hidden-xs">

<script type="text/javascript">
$('#main').carousel({
  interval: 10000
});


// handles the carousel thumbnails
$('[id^=carousel-selector-]').click( function(){
  var id_selector = $(this).attr("id");
  var id = id_selector.substr(id_selector.length -1);
  id = parseInt(id);
  $('#main').carousel(id);
  $('[id^=carousel-selector-]').removeClass('selected');
  $(this).addClass('selected');
});

$('#main').bind('slide.bs.carousel', function (e) {
  var slideFrom = $(this).find('.active').index();
  var videoContent = $('.item[data-slide-number='+slideFrom+'] .embed-responsive');
  videoContent.html( videoContent.html() );
});

// when the carousel slides, auto update
$('#main').on('slid.bs.carousel', function (e) {
  var id = $('.item.active').data('slide-number');
  id = parseInt(id);
  $('[id^=carousel-selector-]').removeClass('selected');
  $('[id=carousel-selector-'+id+']').addClass('selected');
});


</script>

}
}
